Text: The Ball State Daily News is the student newspaper of Ball State University, located in Muncie, Indiana.
Triplets:<The Ball State Daily News
1:
--------------------
Text: The Ball State Daily News:  The print edition of the newspaper is published Monday through Thursday during the academic year except during exams or vacations.
Triplets:<The Ball State Daily News
3:
--------------------
<Text: The Ball State Daily News:  The newspaper is available free to students at various locations on the university campus.>
Triplets:<The Ball State Daily News
4:
--------------------
Text: The Ball State Daily News:  The paper has a circulation of 8,000.

Triplets:<The Ball State Daily News

Text: The Ball State Daily News:  Students are also responsible for maintaining the up-to-the-minute Web version of the paper.
